titleStmt.title: Great news from Tingmouth; Torbay and Exon. Giving an account of the several actions of the French invaders. And Their Majesties forces of Devonshire. The surrendring of several Roman Catholicks, and other material occurrances. In a letter from Exon.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Brown in Little Britain,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped at head; print faded.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
